item.title: By: Joe Singer
item.dc:creator: Joe Singer
item.description: <p>Hi MAtt,</p><p>I hope you are well.</p><p>I am an Owner at Vigilus LLC. Eric Mack suggested I get in tough with you.</p><p>I have a mature Lotus Notes CRM application that I am looking to upgrade with Xpages.</p><p>Can you contact me via email?</p><p>Thanks in advance.</p><p>Best regards,<br/>Joe Singer</p>
item.content:encoded:
Hi MAtt,

I hope you are well.

I am an Owner at Vigilus LLC. Eric Mack suggested I get in tough with you.

I have a mature Lotus Notes CRM application that I am looking to upgrade with Xpages.

Can you contact me via email?

Thanks in advance.

Best regards,
Joe Singer
